Text.text: The analytic map is useful for displaying quantitative or qualitative data by coloring various regions or points of interests, e.g. to visualize the revenue in different countries. The analytic map control can be minimized to a thumbnail, which can e.g. be used for the SAP Fiori Launchpad. The size of the thumbnail can be chosen by the application. In the minimized state only the thumbnail click event is available, all other mouse, keyboard, and touch events are disabled.
